thread.title_full: Russians advance at the front near Novohrodivka, Zavitne, Toretsk and Ptychke - DeepState | УНН

author: Julia Kotwicka
title: Russians advance at the front near Novohrodivka, Zavitne, Toretsk and Ptychke - DeepState | УНН
text: Russians advance at the front near Novohrodivka, Zavitne, Toretsk and Ptychke - DeepState Kyiv • UNN According to DeepState, Russian troops have made advances near Novohrodivka, Zavitne, in Toretsk and Ptych. On the front line, the occupiers advanced near Novohrodivka, Zavitne, Toretsk and Ptych. This was reported by DeepState, according to UNN. Ukrainian Defense Forces achieved success near Novovodyane. Enemy advances near Novohrodivka, Zavitne, Toretsk and Ptychke Add In the Pokrovsk sector, the militants continue to actively attack. Thus, today the main fighting took place in the areas of Mykhailivka, Novohrodivka and Mykolaivka.
